website_summaries.verdict: Beautifully feminine shoes that prove you don't have to spend a lot to look great. Hands down the best choice if you are keeping up with style on a budget.
pros: Affordable w with classic leather styling
Wide variety of colors and patterns
Memory midsole provides comfort and shock absorption
cons: They run a bit tight.Some owners find that the light-colored leather options scuff easily

customer_reviews.title: great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: great pair of shoes! fit very comfortably, however, if ANYTHING rubs against them, they scuff or fade right away. I have worn them 3 times, and they are starting to look like I've had them for years. Very dingy looking. Extremely disappointed in the look of the material now, especially after paying what I did for them...
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Love the orchid color - very vibrant - and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the orchid color - very vibrant - and the detailing and style. Heels looks beautiful and the shoes look very elegant. So far worn them only around the house, but they are comfortable and fit well. They are a bit narrow though, but manageable. I wear size 6.5, the color I wanted was not available in that size so I purchased size 7. It fits comfortably. I've had other JS shoes before and they fit well in 6.5. So you aren't too picky half-a-size shouldn't make a big difference in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: JS shoes are extremely comfortable and affordable, these are perfect heels to walk several blocks in. The natural/nude does scuff or lose color but it still seems to work well for the office or with jeans. The black is solid and smooth...doesn't lose color. Update: I can walk a few blocks and feel fine then the leather starts to fold by my big toe bone( bunion) and it's very painful. Wouldn't recommend these if you have bunions, stick to almond toe shoes, or see about stretchingthem, although the color may fade.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Order a 1/2 size down
customer_reviews.text: These shoes ran large which was strange to me because I have always been a size 5.5 in all other Jessica Simpson shoes. I wanted to love these shoes because they are so cute. The 5.5 was too tight in the toes but too big in the heel. Therefore it rubbed terrible blisters on my feet after just a few hours of wearing them. They also scuffed so easily. After one day of wearing them in an office environment with mostly desk work there were several marks and scuffs not to mention that my feet were bleeding. These shoes are so cute but unfortunately I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: K & E

customer_reviews.title: Heel Slips
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do not stay on my heel. They didn't make the heel deep enough, it's too shallow. I want to return them, but the surface on the bottom of the shoe instantly rubs off and the shoe looks worn, even after just 10 minutes of wear. How am I supposed to know if these shoes work for me without at least wearing them for a few minutes? I want to return them, but will you let me?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent the incorrect EURO size....!?
customer_reviews.text: Unwearable but there are none left. I always wear 8 1/2 in JS brand heels, have many pairs. I ordered a 9 in this due to the pointy toe and reviews. They are WAY TOO SMALL! The box says 9, but the shoe says Euro 37. This is NOT a US 9. Had to give away. Very upset! But the shoe is gorgeous. I can’t find them anywhere now. Wish I had been sent the correct size in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as elegant as it looks in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I am a long-time fan of JS heels but this did not live up to my expectations. I’m so bummed! The heel is a little too chunky for my liking and the shoe itself seems somehow strangely bulky. Was hoping for a sleek sophisticated shoe and didn’t love this one. Felt cheap. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Sexy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. My only complaint is that my right foot is larger than my left so the right is very tight (not the brand's fault). I got around this problem by heating the shoe with a hair dryer and then sliding my foot in to expand the toe box. Let it cool and it should stay put. However because it is tight you can kind of see my toes pushing out.
customer_reviews.author: Al Phemale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, but more brown than nude.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, but the color is not a true nude it is more of a brown/camel nude color. I have a pair of nude patent leather Jessica Simpson heels that are a gorgeous color and that is the same color I expected, but did not get. I also read reviews stating to order a half size bigger as the shoe fit tighter. I followed the suggestions and ordered a half size larger, size 7.5 than what I normally wear of a size 7. The 7.5 swallowed my foot. I ended up returning the shoes based on the color and size.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany S

customer_reviews.title: Walking away with your money. Drop heels and run away!
customer_reviews.text: I either got defective pair or all of them are this way!? The exterior started peeling a week after return period was over and hardly used them...Second time ordering. 1st pair had heel issues and same peeling issue. Maybe they don't like my California weather😜
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: I really believe these are counterfeit.
customer_reviews.text: I am looking at two pairs of Jessica Simpson shoes are purchased at the same time and while they appear to be similar there are some pretty stark differences. The label is super sketchy and they are far less comfortable than the others. I hope this is not an error or oversight buy Amazon because this is the third time I have received a counterfeit-like product from the website.
customer_reviews.author: UserHelp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got the cork/cream patterned pumps. The fit is excellent for wide feet - I got my regular 7.5 size and had no issues. Extremely comfortable and excellent height. I will be back to buy this pump in more colors/patterns soon! Update: Have been wearing these more regularly and they definitely feel tight on my wider feet. However, the more I wear them the more they stretch out. If you have very wide feet perhaps consider going 1/2 size up. I find them comfortable enough to wear all day, but usually have to change to another pair of shoes when I get in my car at the end of a long work day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very uncomfortable! They start to rub blisters within just a few minutes of wearing them. I have not been able to make myself get out of the house with them on. I change before I leave! Very disappointed!! I wear heels every day and I was really excited about these shoes because I have been happy with my past Jessica Simpson heels. Unfortunately I missed the window for returning them or I would be sending them back!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel graham

customer_reviews.title: I love these. I've had them for almost a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I've had them for almost a year and they are still very comfortable and look relatively new. They are a little higher than I would have preferred, but are as advertised. There was no comparable shoe in my price range at the time of purchase that was close to the height I wanted. I will likely buy these in another color eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Dear Jessica...I love you
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I got the black ones. The point is not too long, the way it shows the arch of the foot is sexy but not too sexy, the height is not too high, and the price is right. Well made shoe and relatively comfortable for the style. I want them in every color! Get 'em!
customer_reviews.author: PaleoBabe

customer_reviews.title: for shizz and gigs
customer_reviews.text: The shoe its self is beautiful. It could probably go with my entire wardrobe.. but.. If you have wide feet. Dont do it.. and if that doesnt convince you then bump up the size.. a entire size.. that is all, I am sadmad at my feet and this shoe
customer_reviews.author: monica lara

customer_reviews.title: Boss Babe Nude Pumps
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these boss babe shoes. This is my second pair. I wore the first out and the heel snapped after roughly 3 years of constant wear and way too much pressure on the heels - I always sit at my desk and balance all my weight on the heel, so it rightfully broke after years of constant abuse. I thought maybe I would branch out and try a different nude heel, but after ordering several different pairs, I came running back to these. Will probably order again in 5 years so please don't change or discontinue the style! I have them in black as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa McAtee

customer_reviews.title: Love these heels
customer_reviews.text: Love these heels. They arrived on time and are perfectly brand new. Definitely for a special occasion or for the office. Classic, versatile pump. I sport heels on the regular so I am good to go to wear all day. However, it depends on the person. But the majority should be fine. Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Renee  - Cleveland,OH

customer_reviews.title: Love lost
customer_reviews.text: It's a lovely pair of shoe which could easily be feet candy buT sadly it runs waaaay too small and the reviews didn't so indicate. I ordered a 9.5 and my feet cudn't get in!!! was soo distressed as I could no longer return to sender as I am outside of the US. I find JS shoes to be unpredictable and tends to run small.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin2472

customer_reviews.title: Love these; style runs small
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, casual shoes. I'm specifying casual since I saw reviews that didn't like the weathered appearance. I like the look. Be warned: they are super, super pointy which makes the front tight, so consider a 1/2 size larger. I bought these in a 6-1/2 and returned them to purchase a 7. Thank you to the seller for the flexibility. If you're used to wearing heels, you should be pretty comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is popping!
customer_reviews.text: These were super hot! I love them and the color is so bold they grabbed everyone's attention! I will definitely buy this shoe in the hot pink and the flower pattern to go with other dresses!
customer_reviews.author: MrsHill

customer_reviews.title: I really really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really really like these shoes, I own several JS shoes and I have never been disappointed. These are stylish, comfortable(for heels anyway) and are very versatile. My only minor complaint is that they show wear faster than any of my other JS shoes. The burnt leather shows scuffs especially around the pointy toe. Overall a great shoe though, I love wearing them and I always get compliments on them. I also love the toe cleavage.

customer_reviews.title: Runs Way too small
customer_reviews.text: For the look, this shoe looks amazing. Unfortunately it runs extremely small. I wear a size 10 shoe. I've always been able to get my foot in a size 10. Sometimes it may be a little snug but I can wear it. I couldn't even get my foot in this shoe. It was like a size 8-1/2 or 9 but the shoe said 10.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Laura

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt find out what os wrong with these shoes but they are super uncomfortable. Wore them to graduation commencement ceremony and it made my day horrible. Ended up with taking them off and walking barefoot... Returning back
customer_reviews.author: Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Jessica = Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wish Jessica would tell EVERY shoemaker what she puts in her shoes to make them so comfortable!!! I bought these in black and they felt so good I bought them in red. I Only buy Jessica heels now.
customer_reviews.author: Sue McCann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are okay. They’re very cute but I didn’t love the fit. My heels kind of slip out of the back but I kept them anyways because I needed a basic black pump and these worked.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great First Impression
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these for more than a few minutes to try on, but I can tell that these will be fairly comfortable. They fit true to size and the insole is nice and cushy, and the heel isn't uncomfortably too high. This is actually higher than what I normally wear, and feel like I'm going to love them.
customer_reviews.author: AThom

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned with the sizing after reading the reviews. I took a chance and went with my regular size (7) and they fit perfectly!! I am so glad! They shoes themselves are beautiful, look muuuch more expensive than they are and they are incredibly comfy! Okay, they are not sneakers comfy but for a pair of high heels they are exceptionally comfortable! Love these! I plan on buying them in other colors asap!
customer_reviews.author: pj001

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I've always purchased Jessica Simpson 10..soo disappointed..this was very small..unable to fit even if stretched
customer_reviews.author: michelle williams brewster

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, but needed to stretch the toe area.
customer_reviews.text: The length of these shoes are as expected, but the toe area is narrow. I bought a shoe stretcher to open out the toe area. Just a couple of hours letting it sit and they were much better. I have this shoe in several colors as well as Steve Madden Proto pumps and had to do it to all of them. I do not have wide feet. The style of these shoes are perfect and they're very sexy. Once I stretched them, I was able to wear them for several hours with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ECS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Jessica Simpson shoe. I really cant say more. Her shoes never disappoint. I own a dozen at least. Love her brand and LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Launa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these. I am used to wearing some sort ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. I am used to wearing some sort of platform so I wasnt sure I was going to like these but I am extremely happy with them. They are high but not too high at all and I they are much easier to walk in than platforms. I feel like they are really part of my feet. They do need a few wears to break them in at the front. But my final comment would bet that they are sexy yet classy and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but runs small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 but here recently I've been getting 9.5 in heels for comfort of my feet in the toe area. These 9.5 are tight in my toes like almost unwearable. I needed them for an event on the same day they arrived...which was a day late after I paid for the guaranteed delivery which is the only reason l didn't return for a 10. 10's have always been too big for me so IDK how I felt about ordered that size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with scuffs from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The shoe arrived damaged with scuffs. Not at all what you would expect from "Macy's" or a department store purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta Ogletree

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes 👠
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous gorgeous gorgeous!!!!!! I'm so in love with those shoes!!! I have many shoes fro JS but those are the most beautiful ones I have!!! The color is stunning and they just fit perfectly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tuzcu lenka

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful,upon opening the box i tried the shoes and the right pair was so big, the sole of the right shoe was different from the left,it looks like it has been tried so many times it expanded,so now i have to send it and pay shipping and there is a restocking fee,shipping was fast but not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe the quality of this shoe. The padding on shoe is amazingly comfortable. The only other company i have ever seen with this feature were shoes made by Tahari. Of course, the entire shoe is well made!! I will be buying alot of Jessica shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: sasha

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes but the invoice said 71/2 and that’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes but the invoice said 71/2 and that’s what I ordered, but the shoes were a 7 .. I Had to wear them because I needed them for a dinner .. so I’m giving 2 stars for the mix up on the size and that I’m stuck with shoes to small .. but the actual shoe is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Huck

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, I can wear at work all day with ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. I always wear a 7.5 in heels and that is what I ordered. The color is not quite the same as the picture though, they are more blush than nude. Comfortable, I can wear at work all day with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: therachelp

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They're very comfortable for heels. I wear then daily, all day. You have to size up 1/2. I wear a 9. I have to get 9.5 in these. I've bought maybe 6 or 7 pairs of these shoes. When they're good they're great! The only problem is, the heels are weak. They break within a short time. I love these shoes so much, I just keep buying. Better workmanship on the heel would give these 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Coda

customer_reviews.title: ... so dificult to find comfort shoes that dont look like a chalup
customer_reviews.text: I have bunions and its so dificult to find comfort shoes that dont look like a chalup, the first time i see it scared me a little because they look so pointed, but i used it an entire day and they were very comfy, truly high recomended
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Nice to Add to Collection
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe. I am trying to get my heel game up so I decided to walk around the house in these. They are somewhat comfortable, will I be able to wear these all day, Nope. I will have flats in my bag or in my trunk for sure. They are cute though, never thought I would like the tip but it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Miamiu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nude pumps!
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. These. Shoes. This is my second pair as my last pair were ready to retire after many, many wears! Fit TTS and comfortable for a 4" heel. May take a day or two to stretch out the patent leather but then you will be good to go! These are the perfect nude shade and go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Meg828

customer_reviews.title: Stylist and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and wear well! I purchased them last fall for a costume and have worn them a handful of times since - they are a tad large on me but I don't think I'd have ordered smaller. These shoes are comfortable and have managed to support all 200 lbs of mine so they've stood the test of time. I will add that the bottom inner lining of the heel came unglued relatively quickly but it couldn't be seen by the public and was easily fixed with new glue. Dancing, daily wear - these heels are durable and will treat you right!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: Great pumps!
customer_reviews.text: Classy, beautiful, comfortable with the little cushion at ball of foot. Many reviews say size up, but I think getting your typical Jessica Simpson size would be perfect. I'm normally a 6.5 with JS shoes and initially bought a 7 and there was a huge gap behind my heel. Exchanged for a 6.5 and it's perfect and super comfortable. I love the scaly texture on the shoe, along with the matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I feel like once I break them in they fit better but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but if you have even a slightly wide foot I wouldn't get them. They just barely fit me, and I don't really have a wide foot....I don't know if it's because I have to get a 5.5 because my feet are small? I had a simular problem with other heals in the same brand. I feel like once I break them in they fit better but I can never wear for long periods of time. They are nicely made and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bandos

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and high quality pump
customer_reviews.text: These are great real leather heels! I bought a second time for work and I love the real leather and pointy toe in a hard to find cognac. The color is a tiny bit too light for my taste so I used a leather conditioner and now they look perfect. I ordered a half size up and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: I love these pumps
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a shoe that can be versatile for work and leisure, look no further! I love these pumps! Fits perfectly and are so comfy! I wear an 8, and ordered an 8, perfect fit! Ordering more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. DNKP

customer_reviews.title: You will need an insole to wear these for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are good quality but after a couple of hours my feet were hurting. I added comfort insoles. These are definitely not made to wear if you’re going to be doing a lot of walking and/or standing. But if you will be sitting most of the time they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these pumps
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these pumps! In fact, I love them so much I own two colors and I re-purchased the black when I damaged the heel by slipping between the space in the concrete sidewalk and rubbing the material off the heel. An unfortunate accident, but prior to that I had over a year of solid use. They are comfortable, very sexy, and are perfect for the office and for a night out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LaFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I was leary at first thinking they would be too small because they hurt initially. After a little time, they were actually comfortable and I stood in them for about 3 hours. I'm not a fan of white shoes but this one is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Star

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes on my birthday!! Love them! Comfortable and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: R.T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shoes. I just love them and they fit great, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: The sole of the shoe is very uncomfortable. It fits really tight on toes and my my heel slips out the back of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy pumps
customer_reviews.text: Love this pair! Comfortable and sturdy pumps with a slight cushion inside! Go-to shoe for work! You do have to be extra careful as the patent rubs very easily. The 7.5 is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis32

customer_reviews.title: Sexy!!But Painful
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this shoe because of the color which is hard to find. The shoes came spotty right out of the box with the color coming off and looks like I've worn them for years. I still kept them because its hard to find this color in an D' orsay pump. Toe box was really tight and narrow with toe cleavage. Heel height is perfect and the shoe provides great stability when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Order a WHOLE size up...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful shoe and I was excited to get it but order a whole size up. Normally I'm a 7 and I've been successful ordering shoes before and I always order heels 1/2 size is. But the 7.5 is still very tight. I'm going to stretch them and will post review after.
customer_reviews.author: Eshe

customer_reviews.title: These heals are beautiful, even more so in person
customer_reviews.text: These heals are beautiful, even more so in person! I gave them four stars because they are little narrow than I like. I have normal width feet. They would make great wedding shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Salena T.

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable foe the height
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is comfortable, it's elegant yet stylish for me. I am a size 7 which I bought but this shoes fits bigger, therefore I am walking out the shoe. I also bought another Jessica Simpson shoe same size 7 and it fits perfect. I love Jessica Simpson shoes, however this is the first time buying one that just a bit big for me :(. I am from the caribbean, so my cost for this was really expensive time i shipped etc, and I don't think i can'l return because of distance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look nice but don't fit well
customer_reviews.text: Shoes seemed to oddly shrink and stretch. They look nice but don't fit well. Kept coming off my heels, so I added inserts, which made them too tight. Prefer other shoe companies with more consistent fit.
customer_reviews.author: christy kinnion

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow. Returned for a bigger size and the shoe still doesn't fit properly and the shoe flops. Weird fitting shoe. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mi-CheleLynette

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are stunning! I typically don't go for patent shoes, but the style I couldn't resist. I was a little nervous when I saw how high they were but after putting them on, they have some added cushion and felt so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall the shoe looks of good quality leather and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 6 but ordered a 6.5 because with point toe shoes you need the extra room for comfort. They are a little roomy in the back but I rather have extra room in the back than be too tight at the toes. I was afraid if I ordered a 6 it would be too small. I was going to exchange for a 6 just to see but the price already went up in a matter of days. I can survive. Overall the shoe looks of good quality leather and comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe !
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9M and sometimes go up a half size but after reading a review that the shoe will stretch a bit I went for the 9M. Its a little tight around the toe as I have read and am hoping that it will give a bit after wearing. The style is very sexy and suede is my favorite. I love the shoe and am contemplating getting them in another color. Fingers crossed my toes won't be crunched forever after a bit of breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: The color is not quite hot pink as pictured, but more of an orchid or magenta. I ordered a 7 1/2 and it is true to size, except the heel slips a little. I picked up some Fab Feet heel pads at Target and now they fit perfect. Not the most comfortable shoes but the pop of color is stunning! I wear them with solid charcoal grey or all black ....love them.
customer_reviews.author: solorider916

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived fast however the shoe is not really comfortable. Really tight in toe area
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived fast however the shoe is not really comfortable. Really tight in toe area. They look pretty in picture but that's about it. I won't wear them and when I tried to return them there is no way of doing it through amazon even with my amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Ula

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't much else to say about these shoes. They are comfortable and elegant looking. I wear between an 8 1/2 and 9. The reviews said they run about a half size small so I ordered a 9. My foot is on the wider side and they fit perfectly. If my foot was narrow I think the 8/12 would be the way to go. That being said I think they run pretty much true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pump
customer_reviews.text: 1. Fits a bit snug, not loose on heel like most reviews state with “my” try on/wear. 2. Shoes toe cleavage that I’m uneasy on if this will be dealbreaker to return. Other than those two things, it’s an overall good show and can be worn all year with versatility of dressing up or dressing down.
customer_reviews.author: JDJ

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice but was too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my usual size but it wasn't even half size smaller. It appeared to be a whole size smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Yolande La P

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great deal but these ran smaller than a pair I ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great deal but these ran smaller than a pair I tried on at another retailer. Overall I’m pretty happy with my purchase 😊
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, Fun & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The design and color are absolutely beautiful. Comfortable, stylish and affordable! I love this purchase🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Love these heels!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite shoes. I love the unique color and that I can dress them up or down. I have re-ordered multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: RYAN BRINKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: One foot slip off my foot every so often depending on the weather ... but this is my 3rd pair and I love them in this color!!..
customer_reviews.author: ccooley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shoe, great color. A little too high for me because I am on my feet a lot so not the most comfortable. But if you don't have to walk much in these they're gorgeous. Maybe if it was a 3.5 inch heel verses 4" it would make the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: A Soft Leather Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Great fit cushioned at ball of feet! I get compliments all the time when I wear them. I only wish the leather didn't show every touch so that I have to frequently condition them/buff them. Still love them though!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, well balanced heels
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I got mine in the burnt umber, and the leather has a luxurious look to it. The heel is taller than I had envisioned, but that being said, they are very well balanced and actually seem easier to walk in than many of my smaller heels. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyH

customer_reviews.title: I love the silver and black brocade -- fancies up the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the silver and black brocade -- fancies up the standard pump. Perfect for a night out in a little black dress. Fits true to size and easy and comfortable to wear out.
customer_reviews.author: CMick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes. And as far as heels go, pretty comfortable. My dog chewed up my first pair and I was heartbroken because I couldn’t find another pair anywhere. So when I found them on Amazon, I ordered them right away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 so, I ordered a 7 but it was too big. I ended up buying a 61/2 from tge same bran in a similar style. Very nice shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I have converted all my crappy brand shoes to this brand
customer_reviews.text: I looooooooooooove the Jessica Simpson brand! I have converted all my crappy brand shoes to this brand. The sizes are just right and the fit is perfect. Ofcourse a bit snug at the beginning but they have to be worn in like any other high heel shoe. After one wear out on the town though, they're perfect! Love her shoe line!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes i have wide feet i wear an 8 1/2 9 1/2 was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Their mom

customer_reviews.title: Give her a shot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the office. I love JS pumps because they provide the height I'm looking for along with a good amount of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: J I

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is stylish and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I receive endless compliments when wearing this shoe. It runs a bit small but it looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tramaine Trotman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shoe but I had to send them back they were to big. Nice leather the heel was just right
customer_reviews.author: BOSS lADY

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable for 4"heals. I haven't mastered wearing them all day because I walk a lot with my job but I'd definitely recommend them. I've had so many compliments on how trendy but sophisticated they are. I'm looking into buying another pair of jessica simpson shoes
customer_reviews.author: jill elmendorf

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous shoe and a great price for the quality! Looks just like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Heller

customer_reviews.title: Fits beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes,fits beautifully. I would have given it 5 star excepting that the inner lining of the shoe is stripping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little shoe, but literally too little. Ordered my usual size and it clearly runs at least one size too small. Didn't have the time to spend swapping/guessing sizes, otherwise I would have. Should have read and heeded other reviews, size up!
customer_reviews.author: Mara McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Definitely good value for money
customer_reviews.text: These shoes represent very good value for money, considering they're leather and not synthetic, they have a reasonably comfortable fit for the heel height and look elegant and classy. Mine are a bit stiff and have a little "breaking in" to do, but I feel very satisfied with the purchase and received several compliments on the first wear!
customer_reviews.author: sweetsusiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. I usually wear an 8 and ordered an ...
customer_reviews.text: These are classy, versatile, sexy pumps. Very pleased. I usually wear an 8 and ordered an 8. They fit as comfortably as this type of shoe can. I always expect heels like this to hurt somewhat after a while. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: zoziank

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are beautiful and very very comfortable to use. They fitted a little loose on the back but not as much as to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, runs WAY smaller than the average shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe, runs WAY smaller than the average shoe. I'm now stuck with them as I can not return them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Grabow

customer_reviews.title: i loved them that much
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i buy this pair (the first ones suffered due to wearing them too much) yes, i loved them that much, the color is beautiful and goes perfect with almost everything, they are VERY comfortable, and i can spend an entire day on them. I also have them in black. I recommend them fully!
customer_reviews.author: MarchNM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Chic
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with a basic pair of black pumps. These are classic and versatile. Very comfortable too! Love the extra padding.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Powers

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I get tons of compliments on them. Very comfortable. I even used them as my wedding shoes
customer_reviews.author: MDabbs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the fit of these shoes. Great with any out for. Good quality!!! I have two pairs and may get a third
customer_reviews.author: William H. Riley II

customer_reviews.title: They are so pretty. I just wish I had ordered a half ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe! They are so pretty. I just wish I had ordered a half size up. They fit a little snug at my toes. Luckily I have a job where I sit down a lot so I usually pop them off under my desk .
customer_reviews.author: shy

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous shoes and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are really classy. And surprisingly 4-inch heel is completely fine height for me. I was worrying it might be too high without platform. (I have to admit I wear high heels a lot.) It was a little bit narrow when I first try it though my feet are slim. After breaking it a little bit which is one day, they are very comfortable to wear now, yay.
customer_reviews.author: mning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect closet staple, hard to walk in
customer_reviews.text: Love these but they are a bit difficult to walk in. On the bright side they look great with so many outfits!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look worn
customer_reviews.text: I just got him from work and opened this package at my front door and they look worn. The back of the shoe is bent as it someone has put their feet in them and there are scuff marks on the toe. I am otw to the ups store to return them! As for the shoe itself I own several pairs of the Claudette heel they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Denitri Douglas

product_meta.title: Jessica Simpson Women's Claudette
product_meta.description:
Sexy high heel pump

Jessica Simpson is famous for her fun, sexy style, and now her signature line of footwear, handbags, and sunglasses brings that same style home to you. From fun western boots to the latest dressy and casual looks, Jessica Simpson shoes, handbags, and sunglasses are where it's at for fun, flirty and fabulous fashion!
